radiographic_examinations.findings: Heterogeneous echogenicity of the thyroid tissue with multiple calcified areas and multiple enlarged lymph nodes.

radiographic_examinations.date: Two and a half years after thyroidectomy
radiographic_examinations.findings: 4.0 cm hypodense, nonenhancing mass anterior to the superior portion of the left kidney contiguous with the left adrenal fossa.

radiographic_examinations.date: A few months after resection of the tumor
radiographic_examinations.findings: No gross recurrence on CT imaging.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Eighteen months after resection, there has been no gross recurrence on CT imaging.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Hypodense, 7.4-cm mass with coarse foci of calcification in the right suprarenal fossa.
